one_reviews_text: No Video, just the timeline and a black screen. Switched to Skybox, which works great. Don't buy this app.

Just bought this in hopes this app topped Skybox's grainy dark colors. But it wouldn't read even one mkv file at all. Would love to change my review but unfortunately all I see is a darkness and srars.
review_feedback: Sorry to bring you a bad experience, please look forward to our next version

one_reviews_text:
I'm not really sure how Moon Player can be so good at certain things: Managing large directories, skipping around within videos instantly, having a plethora of options for antialiasing and image smothing, and yet...

1. For 3D videos, it seems to have a 0% ability to detect if they're 360, 180, SBS, OU, even if it's literally in the file name. Every other player does this by default, but I manually have to specify each time.
2. Audio goes to my default speakers, for some reason. I have to manually toggle all sound to my Rift and then back each time I use this. Forget other players, every other game and app somehow does this just fine, but Moon Player doesn't.
3. The UI is awful. Huge buttons everywhere, but each has a tiny activation spot near the bottom where you see the button light up and you can press it.
4. Minor, but file names tend to not update often on the player. I could be playing a new video and still see the old title. 

All in all It's just enough to keep from requesting a refund,  but just barely. Hopefully it improves.
review_feedback:
Sorry to bring you a bad experience, I have received your feedback, please look forward to our next version
You can give me a contact information, we can give you a test in advance when we send a new version, my email cyw3357@gmail.com

one_reviews_text: Holy S**T this is the worst video app i've ever used.. I paid for this?!???
review_feedback: I ’m sorry to bring you a bad experience, we have recently updated the version, please check.
